import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Clock, Target, TrendingUp, Users, Wrench, Package, DollarSign, CheckCircle, AlertTriangle, BarChart3, ArrowLeft, ChevronDown, ChevronRight } from 'lucide-react'; interface MetricDefinition { id: string; name: string; category: string; description: string; calculation: string; target: string; impact: string; workflowConnection: string; improvementTips: string[]; roleResponsible: string[]; icon: React.ReactNode; } const metricsDefinitions: MetricDefinition[] = [ { id: 'triage-time', name: 'Triage Time', category: 'Operational Efficiency', description: 'Time from truck arrival to initial diagnostic completion and estimate creation', calculation: 'Hours from case creation to first estimate sent', target: 'â‰¤ 4 hours for standard cases', impact: 'Faster triage = Better customer satisfaction + Higher throughput', workflowConnection: 'Spans: Case Created â†’ Update Case â†’ Send Estimate', improvementTips: [ 'Streamline check-in process with pre-arrival communication', 'Use standardized diagnostic protocols', 'Ensure parts availability checks are done upfront', 'Train technicians on efficient diagnostic techniques' ], roleResponsible: ['Service Advisor', 'Technician'], icon: }, { id: 'dwell-time', name: 'Dwell Time', category: 'Operational Efficiency', description: 'Total time truck spends at the service location from arrival to departure', calculation: 'Hours from truck arrival to truck departure (Asset Ready)', target: 'Minimize based on repair complexity', impact: 'Reduced dwell time = Higher customer satisfaction + Lower cost per repair', workflowConnection: 'Spans: Truck Arrives â†’ Truck Departs (entire workflow)', improvementTips: [ 'Optimize parts ordering and availability', 'Improve technician scheduling and resource allocation', 'Streamline administrative processes', 'Enhance communication between all roles' ], roleResponsible: ['Service Advisor', 'Parts Staff', 'Technician'], icon: }, { id: 'customer-satisfaction', name: 'Customer Satisfaction', category: 'Customer Experience', description: 'Customer feedback score based on communication, timeliness, and repair quality', calculation: 'Average rating from customer surveys (1-10 scale)', target: 'â‰¥ 8.5/10 average rating', impact: 'Higher satisfaction = Customer retention + Positive referrals + Repeat business', workflowConnection: 'Influenced by: Communication quality, estimate accuracy, repair timeliness', improvementTips: [ 'Proactive communication at every workflow step', 'Accurate estimate creation and transparent pricing', 'Quality repairs completed on schedule', 'Follow-up after service completion' ], roleResponsible: ['Service Advisor', 'Technician'], icon: }, { id: 'first-time-fix-rate', name: 'First-Time Fix Rate', category: 'Quality', description: 'Percentage of repairs completed successfully without requiring return visits', calculation: '(Successful repairs / Total repairs) Ã— 100', target: 'â‰¥ 95% first-time fix rate', impact: 'Higher fix rate = Reduced costs + Better customer trust + Improved efficiency', workflowConnection: 'Quality ensured in: Diagnostics â†’ Repair Process â†’ Quality Control', improvementTips: [ 'Thorough root cause analysis during diagnostics', 'Complete repair verification before closure', 'Proper technician training and certification', 'Quality parts sourcing and installation' ], roleResponsible: ['Technician', 'Parts Staff'], icon: }, { id: 'parts-availability', name: 'Parts Availability', category: 'Supply Chain', description: 'Percentage of required parts available when needed for repairs', calculation: '(Parts available immediately / Total parts requested) Ã— 100', target: 'â‰¥ 85% immediate availability', impact: 'Better availability = Reduced dwell time + Faster repairs + Lower costs', workflowConnection: 'Critical in: Parts Picked/Ordered â†’ Repair Process phases', improvementTips: [ 'Improve inventory forecasting and stocking', 'Establish reliable supplier relationships', 'Use predictive analytics for parts demand', 'Coordinate with OEM parts networks' ], roleResponsible: ['Parts Staff'], icon: }, { id: 'communication-quality', name: 'Communication Quality', category: 'Customer Experience', description: 'Effectiveness and timeliness of customer communication throughout service', calculation: 'Composite score: Response time + Clarity + Proactivity', target: 'All customers contacted within 2 hours of status changes', impact: 'Better communication = Higher satisfaction + Reduced complaints + Trust building', workflowConnection: 'Required at: Estimate sending â†’ Approval requests â†’ Completion notices', improvementTips: [ 'Implement automated status update systems', 'Train service advisors in clear communication', 'Set communication schedules and stick to them', 'Use multiple communication channels (phone, email, text)' ], roleResponsible: ['Service Advisor'], icon: }, { id: 'revenue-per-ro', name: 'Revenue per RO', category: 'Financial Performance', description: 'Average revenue generated per repair order', calculation: 'Total revenue Ã· Number of completed repair orders', target: 'Varies by service type and complexity', impact: 'Higher revenue = Better profitability + Business growth + Resource optimization', workflowConnection: 'Optimized through: Accurate estimates â†’ Complete repairs â†’ Efficient invoicing', improvementTips: [ 'Identify and recommend necessary additional services', 'Ensure accurate labor time estimates', 'Optimize parts markup and labor rates', 'Minimize warranty and comeback costs' ], roleResponsible: ['Service Advisor', 'Technician'], icon: }, { id: 'workflow-efficiency', name: 'Workflow Efficiency', category: 'Operational Efficiency', description: 'How smoothly cases move through the service workflow without delays', calculation: 'Steps completed on time Ã· Total workflow steps Ã— 100', target: 'â‰¥ 90% steps completed within target timeframes', impact: 'Higher efficiency = Reduced costs + Better resource utilization + Faster service', workflowConnection: 'Measured across all workflow steps from Case Created to Truck Departs', improvementTips: [ 'Eliminate bottlenecks in workflow transitions', 'Improve coordination between roles', 'Use workflow automation where possible', 'Monitor and address delays proactively' ], roleResponsible: ['Service Advisor', 'Parts Staff', 'Technician'], icon: } ]; const categories = ['All Categories', 'Operational Efficiency', 'Customer Experience', 'Quality', 'Supply Chain', 'Financial Performance']; export default function MetricsDefinitions() { const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState('All Categories'); const [expandedMetric, setExpandedMetric] = useState(null); const filteredMetrics = selectedCategory === 'All Categories' ? metricsDefinitions : metricsDefinitions.filter(metric => metric.category === selectedCategory); const toggleMetricExpansion = (metricId: string) => { setExpandedMetric(expandedMetric === metricId ? null : metricId); }; const getCategoryColor = (category: string) => { const colors = { 'Operational Efficiency': 'text-blue-400', 'Customer Experience': 'text-green-400', 'Quality': 'text-purple-400', 'Supply Chain': 'text-orange-400', 'Financial Performance': 'text-yellow-400' }; return colors[category as keyof typeof colors] || 'text-slate-400'; }; return (
